name: Finally! An effective treatment for male pattern baldness!
name_original: Finally! An effective treatment for male pattern baldness!
description:
Made for the LD50 jam. Theme: "Delay the inevitable"

Hold the left mouse button and drag to apply hair treatment.

Here’s the kicker though: our man Rod is subscribed to a hair loss treatment mail order service and must ration his treatment between deliveries.

Don't let Rod go completely bald or he'll succumb to low self-esteem!

Andrew Krause - Programming

Alexis Nocito - Art

Jason Quattrone - Concept, Music, and SFX

Siena Quattrone - Music and SFX
